kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.msg: Page title is 'FakeStore – Sklep do nauki testowania'.
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Prices sorted in ascending order: ['0,00 zł', '2 799,00 zł', '2 999,00 zł', '2 999,99 zł', '8 200,00 zł']
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.arg: sorted(${prices_text}, key=lambda x: int(float(x.replace(' zł', '').replace(' ', '').replace(',', '.'))), reverse=True)
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

test.doc: Test verifying the functionality of sorting options by price ascending. This test case validates that the prices are sorted in ascending order.

suite.doc: Test Case: Product Sorting Functionality Title: Verify if a user can successfully sort Climbing products.
